entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
